['Now creates the whole crevasse instantly in front of Earthshaker, instead of over 0.5 seconds.', 'The crevasse is now always a straight line and no longer curves because of buildings or props.', 'No longer creates ground rippling effects along the crevasse.', 'No longer randomly fails to damage and stun hit enemies.', 'No longer destroys trees.', 'Recoded  Fissure:
Now creates the whole crevasse instantly in front of Earthshaker, instead of over 0.5 seconds.
The crevasse is now always a straight line and no longer curves because of buildings or props.
No longer creates ground rippling effects along the crevasse.
No longer randomly fails to damage and stun hit enemies.
No longer destroys trees.']
